name: Ronald Reagan
bio: 40th President of the United States from 1981 to 1989. A fan of italian food and my wife Nancy. Check out my killer fudge brownies.
address: Bonita Canyon Sports Park, Ford Rd, Newport Beach, CA 92660

menu.name: Ronnies Stroganoff
menu.description: Classic Beef stroganoff with braised tritip, crimini mushrooms, with a decadent cream sauce over home made egg noodles.

menu.name: The Best Mac and Cheese in America
menu.description: Homemade spiral macaroni smothered in rich gruyere and white cheddar beschamel. Never go boxed again!

menu.name: The Man's Jelly Beans
menu.description: I could never seem to get enough of these, so now I make my own!

menu.name: The Great American Classic Burger
menu.description: Thick beef patty, with a slice of American cheese, dill pickle, bacon, butter bib lettuce, tomoato, red onion, and dill aoli on a buttered and toasted bun.

menu.name: Nothing is More American than Apple Pie
menu.description: Classic light and crispy crust, with sweet cordialsed apples, spiced with cinnammon and nutmeg, all topped with a sweet, crispy, baked merangue.

name: Immogene Von Svesterkrank
bio: Federal Special Agent in the FBI's BAU pursuing the world's most dangerous serial killers. I write romance novels and DBZ fan fic in my spare time.  My Larb Salad is to die for.

menu.name: Ultimate Spam Sandwich
menu.description: A spicy, crispy slice of spam, covered in spicy mayo, topped with a chive coevered marbelized egg, and pickled shiso onions all on a toasted hawaiian roll.

menu.name: Whole Pan -O- Nachos
menu.description: A baking cheet covered in crispy white corn chips, covered in Santa Fe Salsa, a three cheese blend and chorizo.

menu.name: Not your Dad's Tuna Melt
menu.description: Premium, Oil packed tuna mixed with white onion, capers, sambal olek, mozzarealla nuggets, and mayo all placed on a toasted Jalapeno Cheddar roll and covered in melted white cheddar cheese.

menu.name: Spicy Pork Larb
menu.description: Ground pork, thai chilies, lime, powedered toasted rice, and baby bibb for wrapping it all up.

menu.name: Cornbread Bibinka
menu.description: A philipino twist to the bbq classic. Layered sweet and soft ricecake mixed with a classic cornbread recipie. Trusly something to experience.

name: Arthur Pendragon
bio: Legendary British King, One of the Nine Worthies, wielder of Excalibur, and destroyer of Saxons. Big fan of Bradley James' work. I specialize in cooking wild game.

menu.name: Whole Roast Boar
menu.description: Whole Roast BoarFreshly pulled from my hunting forest, I have my man servant baste it in butter for a half day over and open flame. Best paired with a rich red wine.

menu.name: Stargazy Pie
menu.description: Whole fish in a delicious gravy topped with a biscuit-like crust. Cheffy makes the best.

menu.name: Toffee Apples
menu.description: Apples dipped in liquid toffee and covered in freshly chopped nuts.

menu.name: Boiled Beef
menu.description: Boiled Beef shoulder in beef bullion broth, mashed turnips, spring onion and carrots.

menu.name: Beans on Toast
menu.description: Something the peasants eat, toasted country loaf with a fried egg and of course beans in a tomato based demi glace.

name: Liam Neeson
bio: Northern Irish Actor from Belfast. I love wrinkling my forehead and wielding lightsabers. I will find you and I will feed you.

menu.name: Croak Kim
menu.description: This is my daughters favorite breakfast. A ham and cheese sandwich, enriched with bechamel, and topped with melted gruyere and a over easy egg.

menu.name: Hotel Continental
menu.description: As an actor I often find that the best breakfast is one that comes free with the room I stay in for several months while filming. Assorted croissants, boxed juices, and soggy fruit for a quick and nutritious breakfast before kicking bad guy ass.

menu.name: Raz's Only Meal
menu.description: The only thing that Raz Al Ghoul ever ate while training in the norther reaches of Tibet. Various garden vegetables, pickled and fresh, with bean curd and snow melt to drink.

menu.name: My Pie
menu.description: Classic Irish meal - braised lamb, with carrots, leek, and cabbage, topped with broiled mashed potato crust.

menu.name: Best Salad Ever
menu.description: My favorite food - an arugula, fig, and blue cheese salad lightly dressed with bacon, grape seed oil, mustard, and red wine vinegar.

name: Amanda Bynes
bio: Former child actress and recently recovered addict. I love Hawaiian sunsets, my family, and my therapist. Give my Cauliflower Shwarma a try, it's tre chic.

menu.name: Healthy Orange Chicken
menu.description: The dish I go to for comfort - battered and fried chicken thighs, covered in a sticky sweet citrus sauce, and a bowl of white rice.

menu.name: Sweet BBQ Chicken Skewers
menu.description: Sweet BBQ chicken, basted in a tangy and sweet hawaiian bbq sauce, skewered with chunks of pineapple and green onion.

menu.name: Cauliflower Shwarma
menu.description: Spiced Cauliflower roasted and topped with a pomegranate yogurt sauce.

menu.name: Healthiest Greek Salad
menu.description: My trainer says this is all I should eat - mixed greens, english cucumber, kalamata olives, red onion, cherry tomato, and feta cheese dressed in a feta olive and greek spice dressing.

menu.name: Don't Tell my Trainer
menu.description: Plump hot dogs, battered in a secret recipe, and fried to golden perfection. Best after a long night of drinking.
